title: Minkah Fitzpatrick interview, Jameis Winston suspension update (Football 06/29)
description:
Jameis Winston's suspension was made official by the NFL on Thursday afternoon, so Will Brinson breaks down everything you need to know about the Buccaneers quarterback missing the first three games of the season and why the NFL would only give him that length of a suspension when he essentially admitted to sexual assault. Will also breaks down the news that Jerry Richardson was fined $2.75 million by the NFL. And then he's joined by Minkah Fitzpatrick, Dolphins rookie, who talks about handing out a Gatorade Player of the Year award, what his favorite thing to do on the football field is, and whether he's motivated by Stephen Ross' comments about trading down.
